name: open-stage-control-builder
description: A libre desktop OSC bi-directionnal control surface application - builder package

scripts.postinstall: cp resources/images/logo.ico app/browser/favicon.ico && cd app && npm install && cd .. && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && electron-packager ./app open-stage-control --platform=$PLATFORM --arch=$ARCH --out dist/ --icon=resources/images/logo --overwrite --ignore "(node_modules/serialport)"
scripts.deploy-docs: cd resources && mkdocs gh-deploy --clean && rm -rf site
